scripts.test:unit: cd tests/unit && gren make TestRunner --output=../../build/unit-tests.js && cd ../.. && node build/run-unit-tests.js
scripts.test:integration: cd tests/integration && gren make IntegrationRunner --output=../../build/integration-tests.js && cd ../.. && node build/run-integration-tests.js
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
